meanings.definition: Occurring or produced four times a year
meanings.sent1: The company's financial report is released quarterly to show its performance throughout the year.
meanings.sent2: The school holds quarterly meetings to discuss student progress and upcoming events.
meanings.sent3: I can't wait for the quarterly bake sale; I always look forward to trying new treats!
meanings.sent4: The quarterly changes in weather make it challenging to plan outdoor activities.
meanings.sent5: The quarterly exams are a good way to track your learning progress over time.

meanings.definition: A periodical publication issued every three months
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading the quarterly magazine as it provides updates on the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent2: The library subscribes to several quarterly journals for students to access research articles.
meanings.sent3: The quarterly arrived in the mail today, and I can't wait to see what articles are featured.
meanings.sent4: The quarterly always includes a section on healthy living tips to inspire readers.
meanings.sent5: The quarterly publication covers a wide range of topics to cater to different interests.

meanings.sent1: The quarterly budget report breaks down expenses into manageable sections for analysis.
meanings.sent2: The project timeline is divided into quarterly milestones to track progress effectively.
meanings.sent3: The cake was cut into quarterly slices so that everyone at the party could have an equal share.
meanings.sent4: The garden was designed with a quarterly layout, with each section dedicated to different types of plants.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces were sorted into quarterly groups to make it easier to assemble.
